title: [106. Construct Binary Tree from Inorder and Postorder Traversal](https://leetcode.cn/problems/construct-binary-tree-from-inorder-and-postorder-traversal/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
106. Construct Binary Tree from Inorder and Postorder Traversal Description Given two integer arrays inorder and postorder where inorder is the inorder traversal of a binary tree and postorder is the postorder traversal of the same tree, construct and return the binary tree.
 
Example 1:
Input: inorder = [9,3,15,20,7], postorder = [9,15,7,20,3] Output: [3,9,20,null,null,15,7] Example 2:
Input: inorder = [-1], postorder = [-1] Output: [-1]  
Constraints:
1 <= inorder.length <= 3000 postorder.length == inorder.length -3000 <= inorder[i], postorder[i] <= 3000 inorder and postorder consist of unique values. Each value of postorder also appears in inorder. inorder is guaranteed to be the inorder traversal of the tree. postorder is guaranteed to be the postorder traversal of the tree. Related Topics Tree Array Hash Table Divide and Conquer Binary Tree Similar Questions Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal
